destinationFavList.name: Tirta Gangga Water Palace in Bali
destinationFavList.description: The name Tirta Gangga itself comes from the word Tirta which means water, and Gangga which means the name of a river in India. The flowing water is also believed to be holy water and can wash away bad energy. You can also feed the Koi fishes around and swim here. Don't forget to pack a change of clothes!

destinationFavList.name: Ulun Danu Batur Temple in Kintamani
destinationFavList.description: Ulun Danu Batur Temple is one of the most iconic spots that offers a beautiful panorama, since it is located above Lake Batur with Mount Batur as a background. The air temperature is also very cool and fresh, which is perfect for you who want to refresh or calm your mind.

destinationFavList.name: Melasti Beach Ungasan
destinationFavList.description: In a list of the best beaches on Bali, Melasti Beach cannot be missing! This beach is much admired by tourists for its beautiful sea views and cleanliness. The waves on this beach are not too big and safe for those of you who want to play in the water or swim.

destinationFavList.name: Kanto Lampo Waterfall, Ubud
destinationFavList.description: Waterfalls are usually found around forests or mountains, uniquely, Kanto Lampo is located near the residential area of Gianyar, Bali. The waterfall does not flow directly into the river, but passes through the rocks which creates a beautiful and cool atmosphere because of the splashing water around it.

carFavList.title: Toyota Veloz
carFavList.description: This Toyota Veloz type has been in great demand before it was launched. The newest design looks cooler and more modern and the capacity can also reach up to 7 passengers! You and your family will definitely be comfortable during the holidays

carFavList.title: Suzuki Ertiga Gx
carFavList.description: The Suzuki Ertiga Gx car type can also be an option for traveling around the island of Bali. Apart from the large passenger capacity, the security features are also pretty good. Your vacation is guaranteed to be safer & calmer!

carFavList.title: Toyota Hiace Premio
carFavList.description: If you want a relaxing, comfortable, and large-capacity vacation, you can immediately choose the Toyota Hiace Premio. The cabin design is spacious, it will reduce the feeling of aches and fatigue during trips around the city.

articleList.title: Favorite Car Rental Destinations in Bali
articleList.description: Several destination places most visited in Bali are, Kuta Beach, Tanah Lot Temple, Garuda Wisnu Kencana (GWK), and Uluwatu Island. Apart from being strategic and easy to reach, its natural and cultural beauty is also interesting. As in the GWK area, foreign tourists can enjoy several types of Balinese art dances every day. Next is Tanah Lot Temple, which is unique and beautiful since it is located on a large rock on the seafront. On the other hand, to enjoy the panorama, you can eat at several restaurants or cafes around Uluwatu Beach while waiting for the sunset. It is indeed proven that Bali keeps developing and has a very strong attraction for vacations, that's why tourists are never bored to visit the Island of the Gods

articleList.title: Fuel Saving Driving Tips
articleList.description: Saving fuel when renting a car for traveling is certainly one of our ways to save more, right? You can start changing it from the way you normally drive, such as not pressing the pedal too deep, because this is one of the triggers for your gasoline to be more wasteful or you can adjust the ECO indicator to save more.

articleList.title: Spending Holiday Time with Family in Bali Safari and Marine Park
articleList.description: This might be the best place to visit with your children! There are around 120 species of animals here, and for those of you who come here, not only enjoy the atmosphere, but also have an adventure and learn. In addition, Bali Safari and Marine Park is also a wildlife conservation area in Indonesia.

articleList.title: SAffordable and Reliable Rental Car in Bali
articleList.description: Renting a car is the right choice for an easy and cheap travel solution in Bali. You can enjoy more benefits, especially if you rent it at Get&Ride! Lots of car choices, you are allowed to bring pets, and you can be delivered and picked up by our driver too. It's really practical! Come on, book directly via Get&Ride now!

carDetail.rentalTime: Use up to 24 hours per rental day
carDetail.agreeState: I agree to the terms that apply
policies: The duration of car rental per day is 24 hours
Overtime fee per hour 10% of the rental price
Not including fuel, parking, toll and driver

sebelum_pengambilan.title: Before Rental
list: Renters must share with the provider a photo of their driver's license (SIM A or International SIM), as well as their ID Card (KTP or Passport).
Renters must pay a deposit of IDR 500,000 to the provider before the rental start, with the available payment methods.
The deposit will be returned at the latest 7 days after the rental ends.

saat_pengambilan.title: During Pick-Up
list: Renters are required to show a valid driver's license and ID card (KTP or Passport and SIM A or International SIM)
Renters must be over 17 years old.
All documents provided must be original, not in the name of another person, and in accordance with the data registered when ordering at Get & Ride Apps.
Renters must ensure that the rented vehicle is properly used and returned in the same condition as it was originally.

penggunaan.title: Rental Policies Usage
list: Vehicles are not allowed to be transferred to other parties who are not verified by Get & Ride data. Get & Ride parties can forcefully take the vehicle if the following indications occur.
Renters will be charged an additional fee, if the pick-up and return outside the available zone
Renters are allowed to bring pets in certain cars. Make sure pets don't damage or contaminate the vehicle facilities in the car.
Renters are not allowed to carry passengers or luggage that exceeds the capacity of the car being rented.

Renters are responsible for replacement or repair costs in the event of loss or damage to Vehicle Registration Cerfticicate (STNK), car keys, accessories, car tools, head units, tools sets, scratches, stains, and other costs arising from the renters.
Renters are responsible for all parking, traffic and other fines incurred as a result of violations of law during the rental.

pengembalian.title: After Rental Policy
list: The provider has the right not to return the deposit, if the car is damaged or if the tenant violates the law during the rental period.
The provider is not responsible for items left in the car after the renter returns the car to the rental provider.
The renter must return the car with the same volume of fuel as the car was received (bar to bar)
If there is an electronic traffic ticket during the rental period, the rental provider will return the deposit by deducting the fine of the electronic ticket.
Get & Ride is not responsible for accidents, losses, and treatment caused by the accident.

overtime.title: Overtime
list: An overtime fee will be charged if the rental exceeds 24 hours per day.
Renters are given an additional 1 (one) hour of compensation time, and if it is exceeded, the tenant will be charged 10% per hour of the rental price, with a maximum limit of 4 (four) hours.
Overtime of more than 4 hours, will be charged a one-day rental fee.

asuransi.title: Asuransi (belum ready)
list: Jika terjadi kecelakaan, penyewa diwajibkan untuk menyerahkan kepada penyedia semua dokumen yang dibutuhkan oleh perusahan asuransi, termasuk namun tidak terbatas pada KTP/paspor dan SIM A mereka.
Penyewa wajib menanggung beban biaya Risiko Sendiri sebesar Rp350.000 untuk setiap kejadian kecelakan (per panel).
Penyewa wajib menanggung Biaya Risiko Kehilangan (Total Lost Risk) sebesar Rp500.000 jika mobil hilang.
Perselisihan antara pihak akan diselesaikan melalui musyawarah mufakat. Jika dalam waktu 30 hari para pihak belum mencapai mufakat, masalah akan diselesaikan di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Utara.

refund.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
list: Cancellations submitted more than 24 hours prior to pick-up will receive a 100% refund of the total rental fee.
If the cancellation is submitted within 24 to 6 hours before the pick up time, a 50% refund of the total rental fee will be received
Cancellation submitted less than 6 hours before the pick-up time will incur a cancellation fee of 100% of the total rental fee.
The refund process does not apply to promo rental prices and certain types of vehicles.
Refunds are processed up to 14 working days after the refund process has been approved
